game.title: The Enchanted Forest
game.objective: Find the lost princess in the enchanted forest.
game.description: The princess has been kidnapped by an evil witch and taken to her castle in the enchanted forest. You must venture into the forest, find the castle, and rescue the princess.
game.reward: A magic sword and a bag of gold.

task.objective: Find the entrance to the enchanted forest.
task.description: The entrance to the enchanted forest is hidden in the mountains to the east. Find the path that leads to the mountains and follow it until you find the entrance.
Once you have entered the enchanted forest, follow the path that leads to the witch's castle. The castle is located in the center of the forest and is surrounded by a moat.
Once you have found the witch's castle, enter the castle and find the princess. She will be locked in a tower at the top of the castle. Defeat the witch and her minions, and then rescue the princess.
task.location: Tower at the top of the castle

task.objective: Return the princess to the king.
task.description: Once you have rescued the princess, return her to the king in the castle town. The king will reward you for your bravery.
